text:
Two Sigma - NYC - Front-end dev

I lead the UX team at Two Sigma. Currently, we're three people with diverse backgrounds (engineering, HCI, humanities) who have come together to take on the challenge of making every interaction with Two Sigma software more fun and productive.

We're looking for talented front-end developers with an eye for design to help us out on the exciting road ahead of us.

jeff.hendy (at) twosigma.com
